Events

Here the events sent by the module is described.

Event Description
CLASS1.INFORMATION (20) Type=3, On If enabled the event is sent when a relay goes to its active state. Index is 0 for relay 1, 1 for relay 2 and so on. zone and sub-zone set accordingly. Sub-zone for relay is used if it's not zero. Data: Byte 0: Index. Byte 1: Zone Byte 2: Subzone.
CLASS1.INFORMATION (20) Type=4, Off If enabled the event is sent when a relay goes to its inactive state. Index is 0 for relay 1, 1 for relay 2 and so on. Zone and sub-zone set accordingly. Sub-zone for relay is used if it's not zero. Data: Byte 0: Index. Byte 1: Zone Byte 2: Subzone.
CLASS1.INFORMATION (20) Type=24, Stop Index is 0 for relay 1, 1 for relay 2 and so on. Zone and sub-zone set accordingly. Sub-zone for relay is used if it's not zero. Data: Byte 0: Index. Byte 1: Zone Byte 2: Subzone.
CLASS1.INFORMATION (20) Type=25, Start Index is 0 for relay 1, 1 for relay 2 and so on. Zone and sub-zone set accordingly. Sub-zone for relay is used if it's not zero. Data: Byte 0: Index. Byte 1: Zone Byte 2: Subzone.
CLASS1.ALARM (1) Type=2, Alarm occurred Index is 0 for relay 1, 1 for relay 2 and so on. Data: Byte 0: Index. Byte 1: Zone Byte 2: Subzone.
